subject: Re: [junit] J2EE "patterns"
msgSnippet: The latest untestable framework success story. Shame. (or sham .) So said Bill de hÓra on 4/5/2003 -------------------- J. B. Rainsberger wrote: [[[ They are
messageBody:
The latest untestable framework success story. Shame. (or "sham".)

So said Bill de hÓra on 4/5/2003 --------------------
J. B. Rainsberger wrote:

[[[
They are hacks designed to increase performance
and work around the obvious limitations and faulty
intentions of J2EE.
]]]

For most people here, what you need to know upfront about J2EE is
this: it has no role or usecases for testing.

Bill de hÓra
